text: athava koee utpatti, jo tumhaare man mein isase badee ho. phir ve poochhate hain ki kaun hamen punah jeevit karega? aap kah den: vahee, jisane pratham charan mein tumhaaree utpatti kee hai. phir ve aapake aage sir hilaayenge[1] aur kahengeh aisa kab hoga? aap kah den ki sambhavata vah sameep hee hai
